tool.name: Circos visualization of contig sets
tool.help:
This version of circos is meant for comparison between two assemblies that each consists of multiple contigs. For instance, this could be used to compare the contigs generated by Velvet vs. VICUNA.
**Reference**
Krzywinski, M. et al. Circos: an Information Aesthetic for Comparative Genomics. Genome Res (2009) 19:1639-1645
